attributes.action: Keep grass roots and football training on
attributes.background: Not to stop football training and matches

rejection.details:
Organised team sport is already exempt from the rule of 6: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/coronavirus-covid-19-guidance-on-phased-return-of-sport-and-recreation/return-to-recreational-team-sport-framework

If you want football to be exempt from all Covid-19 restrictions, we could accept a petition requesting this, but it would need to be clear that is what you want to happen.
